lead_paragraph: Detectives Sasha Cordoba and Kevin Desormeau are accused of falsely saying that a man was carrying a gun during a 2014 arrest. The case was dismissed.
snippet: Detectives Sasha Cordoba and Kevin Desormeau are accused of falsely saying that a man was carrying a gun during a 2014 arrest. The case was dismissed....

headline.main: Two N.Y.P.D. Officers Are Charged With Lying About a Suspect
headline.print_headline: Two Officers Are Charged With Falsely Reporting That Suspect Was Carrying Gun
